Sentencas: The low-cost and continuous hydrogen production from waste has recently received much attention.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: To achieve clean and efficient in-situ resource utilization, this study proposes a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission, composed of plasma gasification, solid oxide fuel cell, steam turbine cycle, and autothermal reforming.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: The hybrid system is designed as a poly-generation system capable of producing hydrogen, heat, and electricity to self-sustain the energy consumption required to produce hydrogen for the entire plan.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: And a thermodynamic and techno-economic of the hydrogen production system is investigated.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: The results show that the hydrogen production process's energy efficiency and exergy efficiency from medical waste and biogas reach 63.20% and 59.15%, higher than the others.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission

Sentencas: In addition, the system can recover its initial cost in 3.25 years, and the net present value of the new scheme is expected to reach 125,197.65 k$ over a 25-year lifetime.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of a novel hydrogen production system using medical waste and biogas with zero carbon emission
